website_summaries.verdict: Buy Gourmia's automatic cold brewer for fast, chilled coffee, not strong drinks with deep flavor.
pros: The Gourmia GCM6850 Cold Brew Coffee Maker makes carafes of chilled coffee quickly
It runs quietly and has less parts, and is easier to use than other fast cold brewers
cons: The coffee it brews is weak
Faint markings on its lid make it tricky to lock shut

customer_reviews.title: Oh My..MMMM
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a cold brew super marvel hero. 0^0 We love it. Well made, easy to use, and produces great coffee. I run the timer 4-6 times and then a chill cycle. Whole process takes about an hour. I use C_fe B_steo brand fine ground coffee and we drink it within a day or two with milk. Very nice. I really like the care in the packaging and the included color pamphlet with recipes and tips. A quality product from people who care in my opinion. Thanks and kind regards
customer_reviews.author: The Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cold brew
customer_reviews.text: I love cold brew coffee especially in the summers, but making it is such a long process, and buying it is so expensive. This takes care of both of those issues. I can have my cold brew made quickly and easily and get on with my morning instead of realizing I didn't prep my cold brew the day before. I am so excited with all the money and time I am saving, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Simcha Felder

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use cold brew coffe maker
customer_reviews.text: First off, immediately after ordering this product I received an email from the company with great recipes, instructions and offers to help with any problems. Thanks! The machine is easy to use, sleek, easy to clean, and doesnt take up a lot of counter space! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: csmo

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: I usually only drink cold brew, and I broke the glass one i had been using before. I decided to try this one. It is not like a traditional cold brewer. It does make fantastic coffee! If I broke (I am very clumsy) this one, I would buy it again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This makes really good cold brew coffee quickly. I dampen the grounds before starting the cycle, to get good water spread in the filter. I also run it for 2-3 cycles to get the strength I like, but I don't consider this an issue as a cycle only takes a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Really good product.
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw that this product made 4-minute cold-brew, I was highly skeptical. Much to my surprise, the coffee came out very smooth and sweet, and even my coffee-snob brother was impressed. I would recommend using the longer setting (8-10 minutes), but i enjoy a stronger brew, so that's just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Cold-Brew Coffee in minutes
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! All the benefits of a cold-brew coffee in the amount of time it takes to make an instant hot coffee. My days couldn't be better. The simple process of making it makes mornings great! A must have for all iced-coffee drinkers!
customer_reviews.author: Moshe Rubinovich

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 8 days.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and tried their ways to get my coffee to not taste like water. 30 minute cycles still didn’t cut it. Kept trying and after 8 days of trying the pump stopped working so we had no water flowing. Maybe ours was just a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Zach the Outdoor Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great delicious, quick, coffee. Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The Gourmia cold brewer is a great product. I am an avid coffee drinker and I got into cold brew because I love that the coffe is less bitter. The problem was that it can usually take up to 24 hours to make and my busy schedule couldn’t handle that. But with the gourmia it takes only as long as it would take to brew a regular hot coffee to have a delicious strong sweet cold brewed coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya Meissner

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but problematic
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a defective one or not, but as others have, the water runs through the brew basket far too fast leaving dry grounds and tea-colored water even after 16-20 minutes of brew time. (50g coffee and 4 cups water) It appears that the water just finds its way to the basket material and drains out the sides rather than over the grounds.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cold brew coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: What do you think about this? I am very satisfied with my purchase of the cold brew coffee machine. I enjoy iced coffee especially during the spring and summertime. This machine is very easy to use. I am definitely recommending this product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: FULBERT V GALANO

customer_reviews.title: Transformed my coffee experience!
customer_reviews.text: I love cold brew- i used to spend $10 a week on the dunkin cold brew packets and hated how expensive it was. This coffee machine gives me that smooth cold brew taste from home for a fraction of the cost. listen to other reviewers and run the 10 minute cycle 5 times, so I wish they had a 50 minute cycle, but even the hassle of resetting it every 10 minutes is all worth it for the end result- amazing coffee!!! I have not felt the need to go to starbucks or dunkin since getting this.. so worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wish you could use the ice chamber at the same time as brewing it, still all together a fantastic product. I use mine every day, I’m a college kid and this is my first ever review. It’s that good!
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This cold brew iced coffee maker is exactly what I was looking for. Gone are the days of buying and sometimes dumping an expensive cup of sometimes old, sometimes watery iced coffee from my local coffee shop chains. This iced coffee maker has paid for itself in less than a week with the money I'm saving. I highly recommend it to all iced coffee lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Katarivas

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made and makes high quality cold brew coffee. I have used it multiple times already and have been very satisfied with the result. One thing I would like to note is that it does take slightly longer than 4 minutes to make the cold brew coffee, I would recommend 20-40 minutes for a stronger brew, but overall I am very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend the product to anyone who enjoys cold brew coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: RUN! Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all! Product came with no top filter! Really excited to recieve this and then when it finally did come I CAN’T use it. Box was smashed so I can’t even send back.
customer_reviews.author: lois moyer

customer_reviews.title: This machine is a great alternative to spending $ at starbucks
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of cold brew coffee. This machine is a great alternative to spending $ at starbucks. The coffee tastes really good and the machine is super fast and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Mariasha JD

customer_reviews.title: This must be a “As seen on TV” item that got cut..
customer_reviews.text: What a joke! Good idea but epic fail.. they should pay me for my time I wasted waiting for a cup of ice coffee that looks like tea..plus my time boxing it up to send back...
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cauley

customer_reviews.title: Quick coffee and easy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for an iced coffee maker when I found this product. My family has used it everyday since we got it and absolutely love it. It makes cold coffee in under 10 minutes or less. It's easy to assemble and clean and takes up minimal space on the counter. Overall a great product that has become a summer staple in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna S.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when my cold brew coffee maker arrived! It has a really sleek design and looks nice on the kitchen counter. It's very user friendly, and I love how fast it works when you need to grab a coffee while running out of the house. I would totally recommend this product to any cold brew coffee lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Menuchhh

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I love how you can choose the strength of the coffee it gives you the perfect flavor you want to choose defiantly recommend this item .
customer_reviews.author: sheryl

customer_reviews.title: great cold brew
customer_reviews.text: The taste of cold brew is great. The first time I used it following the instructions, the coffee was very weak. After reading other reviews, tried it again with those suggestions about pouring hot water to "bloom" the coffee and it is definitely a better brew.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but had to return
customer_reviews.text: I loved the cold brew at first but ended up having to exchange it after a few days because it stopped working. However, it is very user friendly and works super quickly! I had my cold brew within 10 minutes and it tasted really good. Also, product is very easy to clean and you can make multiple cups within one round.
customer_reviews.author: Chana Lowy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one in less then a month. The motor keeps blowing . I am very dissatisfied. I have yet too mail the first back now I have to mail 2 back. Never again !!!’n
customer_reviews.author: kellie

customer_reviews.title: Quick, effective, and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave reviews, but this machine truly deserves it! It's quick, simple to use, and works like a charm. I like how it has the option to have UNDILUTED cold coffee, which was a problem I had with my old coffee maker. Makes really delicious coffee, so be sure to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Levana Taban

customer_reviews.title: Great cold brew coffee machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a cold brew coffee maker for a while and this product definitely checks all the boxes I was looking for. It is easy to use, quick, and makes great coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Shap

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: This is awful. The first one broke after a couple of weeks so we got a new one, and this one is now not working after a week!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gram

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love coffee but it gets hard to drink hot ones in the summer. I was looking for a quick and easy way to have cold coffee when I came across this machine. It is simple to use and makes a great cold brew in minutes!! Very happy with the machine!
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: Wish this worked
customer_reviews.text: I had to run the water through this over and over still without flavor. Good idea but doesnt work.
customer_reviews.author: Das0421

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a while for a good cold brew coffee machine. I got this and I love it! It’s both affordable and great quality. I love how easy it is and am very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Yosef Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: best coffee maker!!1
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing coffee maker in both taste and function . I put up with Cuisinart leaking coffee maker for far to many years thinking that was normal. It’s not normal people . This coffee pot does NOT leak and still brews a killer cup o joe!! Buy this coffee maker !!
customer_reviews.author: yoni

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I love coffee, so this item was a definite good buy for me. That said, the cold brew came out better than expected and now I can save money on that pricey cold brew through this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Itamar H.

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker so much !! It is so fast and the it makes the concentrate perfect for icing!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Pavick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m thrilled with this product! Nothing beats the 12 hour brew but this is very, very close!! It took 3 attempts to get the right coffee measurement but on the third time—perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: The machine is easy to use, sleek, easy to clean. I am the type of person who usually spends a lot on coffee in a store and in particularly cold brew. Excited that I have this machine - feels like Starbucks in my own house!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Gonter

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like cold brew because its less acidic than brewed coffee. Makes the coffee really quickly and my wife and I are really enjoying using it during this hot summer.
customer_reviews.author: palty frommell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Coffee maker is easy to use. It is very efficient and makes excellent cold brew. The product is easy to clean and seems very durable. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Benson

customer_reviews.title: Cold Brew Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product! I have been looking for a cold brew coffee maker for a while now, and I love this one. It does a perfect job of making my coffee cold without it tasting watery.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Osdoba

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a birthday gift to my daughter. Said she in enjoying the iced coffee machine.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Brickner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I found the Gourmia cold brew coffee maker pretty easy to use. The quality of coffee was just as good as those boutique coffee shops. I would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tiphannie Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Cold brew Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Being a big cold brew person I thought I would give this machine a shot! Who doesnt want to make cold brew at home? Easy to use and clean. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: dorin

customer_reviews.title: Almost works!!!
customer_reviews.text: It brews the coffee just perfect. When you try to use the cool cycle it works every once and a while. I have to bottle it and put in frig the night before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s so easy to use and makes amazing cold brew coffee in just minutes. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah R.

customer_reviews.title: Mr.
customer_reviews.text: Great iced coffee. Was perfect for a mid day coffee while working. I’d recommend if you don’t have a coffee machine already!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: 4 min cold brew is a life/ time saver. Great cold brew coffe taste without the cold brew coffe wait.
customer_reviews.author: theresa alyeshmerni

customer_reviews.title: Definitely best value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Best you can get for this price! Works fast and efficiently!
customer_reviews.author: Eli Lipshitz

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It simple doesn’t make good coffee . The ice holder is just a useless feature unless you have like chopped ice or something.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan preston

customer_reviews.title: Best part of my morning
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and clean. Makes awesome coffee. Best part of my morning!
customer_reviews.author: Uri

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Broken Handle
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this and took it out of the box to find the handle is broken
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: I liked it when it worked correctly, but 2 of them broke... getting a refund now.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it when it worked correctly, but 2 of them broke... getting a refund now.
customer_reviews.author: Brent A.

customer_reviews.title: Loses quality
customer_reviews.text: Spinner quits working after a month or so. Makes rest of product useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Dee

customer_reviews.title: The coffee is super weak - tried multiple different roasts and even double ...
customer_reviews.text: The coffee is super weak - tried multiple different roasts and even double brewed for 20 minutes. After a week of operation, it died today. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in January it was Christmas gift I've been dying for an actual iced coffee maker I've been going to Starbucks and get my coffees and the iced coffees they are very bitter because they grew it hot and poured over ice this machine takes the bitterness completely out and it is perfect for spring and summer I'm definitely using it all summer long
customer_reviews.author: jennifer h.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and makes great coffee
customer_reviews.text: I have never made iced coffee before but I have always liked the taste. With this cold brew I was able to make more than 5 cups at a time, and it takes very little work to do. All you need is ground coffee, water and ice and you can make a batch of cold brew in less than 30 minutes. If you're looking for both good quality and efficiency, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Maryles Shankman

customer_reviews.title: money and time saver
customer_reviews.text: I love my Gourmia Iceed coffee maker. It is so simple to use, and brews delicious coffee within 10 minutes. I have to be up and out super early in the morning so this machine is perfect. I set it up when I get up and by the time I’m dressed my coffee is ready for me. It’s a money saver and a time saver. Plus it looks super cute on my counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Shlomo Mizrahi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - leaks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the girlfriend as she loves iced coffee. After assembling and using a couple of times I’ve noticed that it leaks. I’ve been sure to make sure the reservoir is securely positioned but leaks persist. The only remedy seems to be removal of the reservoir from the base after brewing. I’d return but we tossed the box.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We go by their recommendation, 7tbs. Coffee, 3 cups water and a 10 minutes. cycle, sometimes 2 cycles and use Cafe Bustelo Espresso Molido, ground coffee. We do then microwave heat it and the results are excellent. Huh
customer_reviews.author: Jerold D. Kowalsky

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Overall this works well and my Husband loves it. I have found that running it through 3, 10 minute sets produces the best flavor. Given that cold brew is usually an over night process, this works pretty well to produce a quicker cold brew.
customer_reviews.author: Candance

customer_reviews.title: Weak bad coffee.
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible I've put 4 tablespoons of coffee in for the 2 number and get nothing but weak, weak brew. Do not even ask what it is like when one tries it with ice.
customer_reviews.author: Lawguy

customer_reviews.title: Great cold brew in just a few minutes!
customer_reviews.text: This cold brew maker is great because it produces high quality cold brewed coffee in just a few minutes. The product is very easy to use for both hot coffee and cold brew. When done making coffee, the machine can be easily dissembled to clean each individual piece. I would highly recommend this product for anyone who enjoys iced coffee in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S. Brody

customer_reviews.title: Great maker!!
customer_reviews.text: I need to realize that it may have to take a little longer to make the coffee strong enough. Other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: Great cold coffee.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It's so easy to use and I love the way the coffee comes out. This is great for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working in the first week
customer_reviews.text: My machine only worked for 6 days and then simply would not work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Certainly beats doing it all by hand in two days! Simple and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

product_meta.title: Gourmia GCM6850 Automatic Digital Cold Brew Coffee Maker - 5 Minutes Fast Brew - Patented Ice Chill Cycle - 4 Strength Selector - 4 Cup Capacity - Black
product_meta.description: Why Cold Brew? Because it's cool. Obviously. Unlike hot brewing that releases bitter acidic compounds, cold brewing produces a smoother result that is 67% less acidic. This gentle technique highlights the specific flavor profile and undertones of the coffee grounds and produces a bolder taste. The unique process preserves the coffees health benefits, is easier on the stomach, and leaves your teeth shiny white. While typical cold brew can take up to a very long 24 hours to brew, the Gourmia GCM6850 Automatic Cold Brew slashes the time down to as little as 4 MINUTES! This magical machine is extremely powerful, but simple to operate. Just add your favorite fresh ground coffee, select one of 4 digital strength time modes, and that it! Add ice to activate the chill cycle for instantly icy cold coffee without watery dilution. Make the sweetest, smoothest, and chillest brews- in literally minutes! Gourmias mission is to make everyday cooking easy, healthy, and delicious. Our products deliver a higher standard of innovation, performance, and value. Our founders are experts in the modern world of small appliances and are passionate about providing our customers with dependable, efficient tools that will make life in the kitchen fun and easy.
feature_bullets: 4 STRENGTH MODES: Sleek digital display with four brewing strength timers; Light, medium, bold, or concentrate.
FASTEST EVER: Eliminate the typical cold brewing process that can take up to 24 HOURS. Get yourself the same quality results in as little as 5 MINUTES!
CHILL CYCLE: Exclusive system circulates coffee over ice basket so you can enjoy your coffee icy cold and undiluted- quick.

COLD IS BETTER: Hot brewing releases bitter and acidic compounds. Cold brewing produces a coffee that is 67% less acidic for a far more sweeter, healthier, and flavorful drink-easier on the stomach and teeth.
ETL CERTIFIED: We, at Gourmia, take the quality of our products seriously. This product is ETL certified so you can be confident that youâ€re receiving a safe, efficient, high quality appliance.
